types.html:
hygiaphone m (plural hygiaphones)

  1. grill, transparent, perforated two-way communication device - at a ticket counter etc.
    • 2003, Erik Orsenna, “16-3”, in Madame Bâ, Fayard:
      Ces hygiaphones percés de petits trous pour les mots et d'un plus vaste pour les papiers.
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)
trans: grill, transparent, perforated two-way communication device - at a ticket counter etc.
grill, transparent, perforated two-way communication device - at a ticket counter etc.
grill, transparent, perforated two-way communication device - at a ticket counter etc.

title: hygiaphone
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /i.ʒja.fɔn/
